channel.title: Bob and Mike Audio Podcast

item.description:

item.title: The Noah movie and science verses the Bible
item.itunes:author: Hope
item.description: On our tenth episode we talk about the Noah movie (SPOILERS ALERT) and science and the Bible. Also discussed is funeral arrangements how to get a good parking spot at church with Mike Lee, Bob Dumas, Catholic Joe and other Joe. And don't forget to play along during the "In the Bible or Not" segment.

item.title: I look at my fruit everyday...
item.itunes:author: Hope
item.description:
The 4rd episode of the Bob and Mike Podcast. Topics include: how people know you are a christian, the olympics, parking, politics, hipsters, being saved and levels of virginity. Listen in as Bob Dumas and Mike Lee talk about faith and answer questions from the audience.
Have a question? Submit yours at http://bobandmike.net
